summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Forma Strategy NFT application MVP. All backend APIs working correctly (100% success rate). Frontend displays all components properly with working animations, calculator functionality, NFT gallery, and transaction history. Integration between frontend and backend is seamless.
passed_tests: All 8 backend API endpoints (statistics, NFTs, transactions, calculator, crypto price, data creation)
Hero section with animated statistics cards (NFT floor price, token price, market cap, 24h volume)
Calculator with detailed formulas and result display (treasury inflow, buyback budget, NFTs buyable, supply reduction, price scenarios)
NFT Gallery displaying 20 NFTs with images and pricing information
Transaction History table with 10 transactions showing buy/sell/burn activities
How It Works section with all 4 steps explained
Navigation between sections (Calculator, How It Works, NFTs)
Design compliance with Swiss Brutalism x Eco-Futurism guidelines
CoinGecko API integration for crypto prices
